contextId.information: AT: "all the people of Israel that remain, from the least powerful to the most powerful." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])
contextId.quote: from their smallest to their greatest

contextId.information: This refers to all kinds of people and uses size to refer to how important they are. AT: "the important and the unimportant" or "many people, regardless of how important they are" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])

This is a way to refer to people from every social status. Here "least" and "greatest" represent those who are least important and those who are most important. AT: "all the people from every social status" or "all the people, including the least important and the most important people" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])
contextId.quote: all the people from the least to the greatest
